= Introduction =

Welcome to the Text Message for Chumby Project

This project was originally hosted on Google Code at https://code.google.com/archive/p/text-message-for-chumby/.

The Blog for this project is located at http://chumbydev.blogspot.com/2011/10/txtmsg-web-application-setup.html.
